argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | irredn0.i | |- I = ( Irred ` R ) |
| 2 |  | irredrmul.u | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 |  | irredrmul.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` R ) = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) = ( .r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 3, 5, 6 | #P_opprmul | |- ( Y ( .r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) X ) = ( X .x. Y ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_opprring | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( oppR ` R ) e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 5, 1 | #P_opprirred | |- I = ( Irred ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 5 | #P_opprunit | |- U = ( Unit ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10, 6 | #P_irredrmul | |- ( ( ( oppR ` R ) e. Ring /\ Y e. I /\ X e. U ) -> ( Y ( .r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) X ) e. I ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. I /\ X e. U ) -> ( Y ( .r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) X ) e. I ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3com23 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. I ) -> ( Y ( .r ` ( oppR ` R ) ) X ) e. I ) |
| 14 | 7, 13 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. I ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. I ) |
